[b][When Profane Penitent enters the battlefield,][/b] search your library for an enchantment card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Sacrament {X}{X}{W} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its sacrament cost. If you do, it’s a sorcery without the text in square brackets. Exile it when it resolves.)[/i]
